scenes.dialogue: *Morning*: "Good morning sunshine! It's tooth time!" / *Evening*: "Sleepy time is near! Let's sparkle those teeth!"
"Pick up your magic toothbrush! Hold it gently."
"Take a tiny sip of water. Swish swish swish! Spit it out." *(Avatar swishes water)*
"Just a teeny tiny bit of paste. Like a grain of rice!" *(Avatar points to brush)*
"Can you ROAR like a lion? ROAAR! Open wide!" *(Avatar opens mouth wide)*
"Wiggle wiggle on the bottom! *Fun fact*: Baby teeth help you eat yummy food!" *(Thumbs up)*
"Now the top! Tickle tickle! You're doing AMAZING!" *(Claps)*
"Big cheese smile! Round and round!" *(Avatar smiles big)*
"Stick out your tongue! Brush it gently. Silly face!"
"Time for bubbles! Spit them alllll out!"
"One more sip. Swish and spit! Almost done!"
"HOORAY! Your teeth are SPARKLING! See you later, superstar! 👍"
*Morning*: "Good morning, Cadet! Time to defeat the Sugar Bugs!" / *Late*: "Cadet, you're late! The bugs are stronger. Let's GO!"
"Rinse your mouth! Clear the battlefield!" *(Avatar swishes)*
"Load the fluoride ammo! Pea-sized blast only. Too much slows you down!"
"ATTACK lower left molars! *Did you know?* Molars are the strongest teeth!"
"Sweep to lower right! Don't let any bug escape! Great job, soldier!"
"Upper left sector! Angle your weapon 45 degrees! 💪"
"Upper right! Almost there! *Fact*: Brushing twice daily fights 80% of cavities!"
"Front teeth shield! Circular defense formation!"
"The Tongue Dragon hides bacteria! Brush it gently!" *(Avatar sticks out tongue)*
"SPIT! Launch the foam missiles!"
"Final rinse! Wash away the defeated bugs!"
"MISSION ACCOMPLISHED! You're a Dental Defender! See you tonight! 👍"
*Morning*: "Good morning. Optimal brushing time is after breakfast." / *Late PM*: "You're brushing later than usual. Consistency improves efficacy."
"Begin with a water rinse to remove loose debris." *(Avatar rinses)*
"Apply a pea-sized amount of fluoride toothpaste. Avoid wetting the brush excessively."
"Lower arch, outer surfaces. 45-degree angle to gums. Short strokes." *Tip*: Consistent brushing prevents cavities and gum disease."
"Upper arch, outer surfaces. Maintain gentle pressure. Excellent technique."
"Inner surfaces. Tilt brush vertically for anterior teeth. *Fact*: 90% of cavities occur on inner surfaces."
"Chewing surfaces. Horizontal scrubbing motion. Well done." *(Thumbs up)*
"Tongue bacteria contribute to halitosis. Brush gently from back to front."
"Expectorate. Avoid rinsing immediately—fluoride continues working for 30 minutes."
"Light rinse to clear excess. Your enamel thanks you."
"Protocol complete. Enamel integrity maintained. See you tonight. 👍"
